Methods : Recently admit geriatric patient ( n=71 ) , likely stay 1 week randomise receive fat emulsion ( Calogen , intervention group ( IG ) ) standard care ( control group ( CG ) ) . Thirty ml emulsion give 3 time daily , i.e . 420 kcal , distribute regular medication round . Food intake self-rated appetite register 2-3 day admission day 8 day prior discharge . Nutritional risk screening ( NRS ) 2002 serum lipid fatty acid profile analyse .
